history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: existT. qsimpl time: 1 use: existT.

ctx: intros m1 m2 n [Hn1 Hm1] [Hn2 Hm2].
exceptions.tactic: exists (match Hm1, Hm2 with existT _ x (existT _ y _), existT _ z (existT _ w _) => (x, z) end).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type RA : Relation A RB : Relation B bkiMA : BranchJoinKripkeIntuitionisticModel A bkiMB : BranchJoinKripkeIntuitionisticModel B m1, m2, n : A * B Hn1 : (RA @@1)%signature n m1 Hm1 : (RB @@2)%signature n m1 Hn2 : (RA @@1)%signature n m2 Hm2 : (RB @@2)%signature n m2 The term "Hm1" has type "(RB @@2)%signature n m1" while it is expected to have type "{x : ?T0 & ?T1 x}".

ctx: intros m1 m2 n [Hn1 Hm1] [Hn2 Hm2].
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

ctx: intros m1 m2 n [Hn1 Hm1] [Hn2 Hm2].

ctx: intros m1 m2 n [Hn1 Hm1] [Hn2 Hm2].
exceptions.tactic: apply Korder_no_branch with (m2 := fst m2) (n := fst n).
exceptions.exn: In environment X0, X : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x} A : Type B : Type RA : Relation A RB : Relation B m2 : A m4 : B m0 : A m3 : B n0 : A n1 : B Hn1 : (RA @@1)%signature (n0, n1) (m2, m4) Hm1 : (RB @@2)%signature (n0, n1) (m2, m4) Hn2 : (RA @@1)%signature (n0, n1) (m0, m3) Hm2 : (RB @@2)%signature (n0, n1) (m0, m3) Korder_branch_join0 : forall m1 m2 n : B, n <= m1 -> n <= m2 -> exists m : B, m1 <= m /\\ m2 <= m Korder_branch_join1 : forall m1 m2 n : A, n <= m1 -> n <= m2 -> exists m : A, m1 <= m /\\ m2 <= m The term "m2" has type "A" while it is expected to have type "(?A * ?B)%type".

original: apply Build_BranchJoinKripkeIntuitionisticModel. intros m1 m2 n [Hn1 Hm1] [Hn2 Hm2]. exists (match Hm1, Hm2 with existT _ x (existT _ y _), existT _ z (existT _ w _) => (x, z) end). split. - apply bkiMA. + apply Korder_no_branch with (m2 := fst m2) (n := fst n). * apply (fst m1). * apply (fst m2). + apply Korder_identity with (m := fst n). apply (fst m1). - apply bkiMB. + apply Korder_no_branch with (m2 := snd m2) (n := snd n). * apply (snd m1). * apply (snd m2). + apply Korder_identity with (m := snd n). apply (snd m1).
